ThingDef.label: runic arm
ThingDef.description: Replaces missing arms. The magical properties of runewood are not as potent when stretched across the entireity of an arm, thus a runic hand is a better replacement for a missing finger than a full runic arm.

ThingDef.label: runic leg
ThingDef.description: Replaces missing legs. The magical properties of runewood are not as potent when stretched across the entireity of a leg, thus a runic foot is a better replacement for a missing toe than a full runic leg.

ThingDef.label: runic hand
ThingDef.description: Replaces missing hands. A mostly wooden hand, with some magical capability to move according to the user's will.

ThingDef.label: runic foot
ThingDef.description: Replaces missing feet. A mostly wooden foot, with some magical capability to move according to the user's will.

ThingDef.label: runic eye
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing eye. Can faintly sense the energy of moving objects and auras, relaying them to the user as muddled color.

ThingDef.label: runic nose
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing nose. Covers the hole in the face.

ThingDef.label: runic ear
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing ear. Detects soundwaves and transmits them to the user's brain through much higher, subliminal wavelengths which give the user a foggy 'telepathic' version of whatever was heard.

ThingDef.label: runic jaw
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing jaw. Rows of smooth, wooden teeth both sharp and flat.

ThingDef.label: runic pelvis
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing pelvis. Pretty useful if crawling is not your favourite way of moving around.

ThingDef.label: runic clavicle
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing clavicle. If you somehow manage to break yours.

ThingDef.label: runic brain stabilizer
ThingDef.description: Revives some function in the brain. The magical, stimulating properties of runewood are able to link with the body's senses and replace major neural functions that may have been damaged. Unable to replace the minor intricacies of the brain, the user will be missing some capacities, but still have usage of their brain back.
